1956

Ivan

Chinei Legation, 
Nashington, D.

Sept 18th, 1910

Dear Sir,

of mine, and I have decided to enter 
I Army and Navy Prefa in here, 
gel I Still sorry about the faile 
Z planking of Andoven Nihing that 
You wonéd send me a copy of 
catalogue, so I can send to my 
fathen please

How many Chinese Joya 
in Andover this face? I think 
later on, there must be many 
would come to enter, also

Hope somies later, a 
good news to hear from you 
With best regards.

Truly you do Kuana

Got Your noli just This 
evening from a Chinesa Segation, 
and glad ti hear that your school 
soon be opened, but very sorry 6 
say that my degree ä pretty com 
edm not to prómale in Andover 
The roona, so can let one who 
needs, and thank you very many 
for member about my planting

M. Yong Hwai, the guardian

raw: 1956 Ivan Chinei Legation, Nashington, D. Sept 18th, 1910 Dear Sir, of mine, and I have decided to enter I Army and Navy Prefa in here, gel I Still sorry about the faile Z planking of Andoven Nihing that You wonéd send me a copy of catalogue, so I can send to my fathen please How many Chinese Joya in Andover this face? I think later on, there must be many would come to enter, also Hope somies later, a good news to hear from you With best regards. Truly you do Kuana Got Your noli just This evening from a Chinesa Segation, and glad ti hear that your school soon be opened, but very sorry 6 say that my degree ä pretty com edm not to prómale in Andover The roona, so can let one who needs, and thank you very many for member about my planting M. Yong Hwai, the guardian gons

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Handwritten letter stating that he will not be attending Andover and that he will be admitted to the Army and Navy Prep in the Chinese Ligation. He asks how many Chinese boys will be at Andover this year.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
